item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? My name is Tho, and I am a Software Engineer at Société Général.

title: PGN (Portable Game Notation) Parser description: C++ programming date: 2023-07-28 slug: Programation image: eifel.jpeg categories:

  • Programation

content:

  • type: paragraph text: > This parser supports the PGN format based on: Portable Game Notation.

  • type: paragraph text: > The movetext is based on SAN (Standard Algebraic Notation). Disambiguation is supported by checking VerifyIfKingBeingCheck before accepting a move. PGN file format error detection.

  • type: paragraph text: > Output format: The state of the board at the end of the game, in the form of an 8x8 grid.

  • type: code language: plaintext code: | bR|bN|bB|bQ|bK|bB|bN|bR bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP|bP | | | | | | |
    | | | | | | |
    | | | | | | |
    | | | | | | |
    wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP|wP wR|wN|wB|wQ|wK|wB|wN|wR

  • type: heading level: 2 text: Input

  • type: code language: plaintext code: |

    1. e4 e6
    2. e5 f6
    3. exf6 gxf6
    4. Ke2 h6
    5. Ke3 h5
    6. Ke4 e5
    7. Nh3 d6
    8. Ng5 Be6
    9. Nf3 Bh3
    10. Nc3 Bxg2
    11. Na4 b6
    12. Nc5 b5
    13. Nd3 b4
    14. Nxe5 b3 1/2-1/2

  • type: heading level: 2 text: Output

  • type: code language: plaintext code: | bR|bN| |bQ|bK|bB|bN|bR bP| |bP| | | | |
    | | |bP| |bP| |
    | | | |wN| | |bP | | | |wK| | |
    |bP| | | |wN| |
    wP|wP|wP|wP| |wP|bB|wP wR| |wB|wQ| |wB| |wR

  • type: paragraph text: > Runtime polymorphism in class Move; Dispatch using std::variant, std::visit and CRTP (Curiously Recurring Template Pattern) in template class BasePiece;
